Detailed Description

Function Documentation

int ctk_signal_write ( ctk_spe_t  spe,
unsigned int  reg,
unsigned int  data 
)

Writes the data to the signal notification register specified by reg for the given SPE. [This will block until the SPE starts if it has not yet started]

Parameters:
[in] spe - the SPE whose outbound mailbox is to be read.
[in] reg - the signal register. This can be one of either CTK_SIGNAL_REG1 or CTK_SIGNAL_REG2.
[in] data - the 32-bit data to be written
Returns:
CTK_SUCCESS (0) on success, errno on failure.

static int ctk_signal_write_reg1 ( ctk_spe_t  spe,
unsigned int  data 
) [inline, static]

Writes the data to the signal notification register 1 for the given SPE.

Parameters:
[in] spe - the SPE whose outbound mailbox is to be read.
[in] data - the 32-bit data to be written
Returns:
CTK_SUCCESS (0) on success, errno on failure.

static int ctk_signal_write_reg2 ( ctk_spe_t  spe,
unsigned int  data 
) [inline, static]

Writes the data to the signal notification register 2 for the given SPE.

Parameters:
[in] spe - the SPE whose outbound mailbox is to be read.
[in] data - the 32-bit data to be written
Returns:
CTK_SUCCESS (0) on success, errno on failure.
